page.title: 15Pick Your Own Fruit.
page.content: People can go in summer to{Hayford {Farm}to pick strawberries,black and red currants,raspberries,gooseberries and vegetables.Mr.Jones first went in to strawberry farming{seven years ago because he wanted something new as he thought the{milk quotas}set by the Common Market might stop him producing as much milk as he wanted. He has{5 acres}of stawberries.He puts 10,000 plants in each acre.In the 1st year they give half a ton of straw- berries per acre.By the 3rd year they will increase their yield to 1 and a half tons.In the 4th year Mr. Jones ploughs them up and sets new plants.He chose to use some peaty ground for fruit farming because it was not very good for grazing and the strawberries grow well there.He uses{10 acres}alto- gether for fruit and vegetables.Its a very popular place in summer!
